parameter.value: Another creature who believes thinks physical strength is more important than wisdom! Why are you disturbing me?
Once I was the master of all mages, but now I only protect this {crypt}.
Here lies my {master}. Only his closest followers may enter.
If you are one of his followers, you need not ask about him, for you will know. And if you aren't, you are not worthy anyway!
To those who have lived for a thousand years time holds no more terror.
The castle was destroyed when my {master} tried to summon a nameless creature. All that is left is this {volcano}.
I can still feel the magical energy in the volcano.
